original: @193b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @193b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta sto tram /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta sto tram /
translated: Sarva-tathagata-stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa /
translated: Praise to All Tathagatas

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo ;
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo ;
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: / bstan pa 'gro ba kun gyi mchog gyur cing //
analyzed: / bstan pa 'gro ba kun gyi mchog gyur cing //
translated: The teachings are the supreme refuge for all beings,

original: gzhan don rdzogs mdzad pa la rnam par mkhas //
analyzed: gzhan don rdzogs mdzad pa la rnam par mkhas //
translated: And you are skilled in fulfilling the welfare of others.

original: nyon mongs sbrul chen kun du 'byin mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: nyon mongs sbrul chen kun du 'byin mdzad pa'i //
translated: You are the one who completely extracts the great poisonous snakes of afflictions,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I pay homage and bow to all the Tathagatas.

original: zag bcas bag chags thams cad spangs gyur cing //
analyzed: zag bcas bag chags thams cad spangs gyur cing //
translated: You have abandoned all contaminated latent tendencies,

original: don kun de nyid nges par gzigs mdzad pa //
analyzed: don kun de nyid nges par gzigs mdzad pa //
translated: And you see the truth of all meanings.

original: skye dgu thams cad don la brtson gyur pa //
analyzed: skye dgu thams cad don la brtson gyur pa //
translated: You strive for the welfare of all beings,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I pay homage and bow to all the Tathagatas.

original: dam chos rin chen 'byung gnas snod gyur cing //
analyzed: dam chos rin chen 'byung gnas snod gyur cing //
translated: You are the vessel for the precious source of the sublime Dharma,

original: lam mchog mya ngan 'das pa ston mdzad la //
analyzed: lam mchog mya ngan 'das pa ston mdzad la //
translated: And you reveal the supreme path of nirvana.

original: yid la re ba kun du rdzogs mdzad pa'i //
analyzed: yid la re ba kun du rdzogs mdzad pa'i //
translated: You fulfill all wishes,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I pay homage and bow to all the Tathagatas.

original: 'jig rten rnams la rjes brtser mngon par gus //
analyzed: 'jig rten rnams la rjes brtser mngon par gus //
